title: What To Do When You Don't Know Which Option To Take
dc:creator: Tracy Brinkmann | Personal Development in the spirit of Tony Robbins, Napoleon Hill, & Zig Ziglar
description: What To Do When You Don't Know What You Want but have to decide. Weâ€™ve all been there. Itâ€™s easy to get stuck when none of your options stand out clearly over the other(s). One job has better hours and more interesting work, but the other possibility offers a better salary. The best options may be less than obvious. Unfortunately, failing to make decisions in a timely matter can even bigger negative repercussions. Sure, with more time, you can probably come up with more elegant solutions. However, when time is short, and you are limited to just a few options, none of which may be very good - what do you do then? Â How do you decide? Â Let me share these 8 decision making helper when youâ€™re unsure of what you want or unclear on which one will get you to YOUR SUCCESS AT LAST! - CLICK & LISTEN then LIKE & SHARE!
